question: You are planning to go and study English at a school overseas. You would like some information about their courses.Write a letter to the school. In your letterask about the schoolsay what kind of accommodation you wantmention any special requests you have (for example diet).
text: Hello, I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing this letter to enquire more information about the English program.

I came across your school website by chance. I'd like to know more about your school, for example, its address, history, qualification, etc. I also want to know  if there is anything I need to prepare before coming.

As for the accommodation, I prefer a single room because it is much more comfortable living by myself. At the same time, I would like to plant some flowers during my stay, so having a balcony attached to the room is a preferable option for me.

By the way, I will bring my pets with me. If it is possible, I may request a shelter for my dog, Lily. Lily not only has a cute appearance，but also possesses a mild temperament. Don't you need to worry he will bark all night.

error_list.error_des: The comma before the conjunction but also appears to be unnecessary. Consider removing it.
Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
